article.description: — Bodie Hume had a career-high 27 points as Northern Colorado narrowly defeated Idaho State 69-64 on Tuesday in a Big Sky Conference opener for both teams.
article.headline: Hume scores 27 to lift Northern Colorado past Idaho St 69-64
article.linkText: Hume scores 27 to lift Northern Colorado past Idaho St 69-64
article.story: GREELEY, Colo. -- — Bodie Hume had a career-high 27 points as Northern Colorado narrowly defeated Idaho State 69-64 on Tuesday in a Big Sky Conference opener for both teams. Daylen Kountz had 10 points for Northern Colorado (4-2). Kur Jockuch added 10 points and 11 rebounds. Brayden Parker had 21 points and 10 rebounds for the Bengals (3-5). Robert Ford III added 14 points and 11 rebounds. ------ For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP--Top25 ------ This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
